column4: I'd like to know the answer to Friar's Q as well - 80-90KB/sec sounds bad - I thought usenet downloads went through SSL tunnels
I have a server at home, and I want to transfer some movies from it...I'm abroad for work right now....but it takes forever. I'm transferring a few GB right now and it says 22 hours.
have you checked the max speed of your line?
beli, ikonia, thanks for the info...even if it isn't what I wanted to hear. at least I know there isn't anything wrong with my server...
